q: Following are analysts' comments on his decision and its implications for Prime Minister David Cameron : LABOUR PARTY LEADER ED MILIBAND Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's ability to do his job given the cloud of allegations hanging over him. We think he should have gone earlier. He has now done the right thing. I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgement, about hanging on to him as long as he did. If we're ever going to win the fight against international terrorism, the rule of law must hold strong. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice-president of engineering and research. to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. "Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: "For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune."
